feed.title: Travis Whitacre
feed.subtitle: I am an economics PhD student whose fields are health economics, and applied microeconomics with intersection into economic education and demography.

entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: I am a PhD student in the Department of Economics at SMU. My primary fields are Health Economics and Applied Microeconometrics, but my research also intersects with the Economics of Education and Economic Demography. I am currently a third year student, so be on the lookout for a working draft of a few of my current projects soon!
